text: Kaya tumhi haji lokanna pani pajane ani masjide harama (kabagrha) ci seva karane, tyacyasamana tharavile ahe, jo allahavara ani kayamatacya divasavara imana rakhila ani allahacya margata jihada (sangharsa) karila. He allahajavala samana nahi1 ani sarvasrestha allaha atyacari lokanna marga dakhavita nahi
